page.title: 03The Weekend.
page.content: On Saturday morning I woke up at half past ten and I got my breakfast.Then I went out on my BMX to the BMX track. At twelve noon I went to my Nana's for dinner.I had chips,beans and pie.Then onthe afternoon I went to see my auntie.Iplayed with our James all of the time.I went home for my tea and then back to the BMX track till nine o'clock.I then went home for bed. I woke up at 8 o'clock on Sunday morning,got dressed and went down for my breakfast.I then went to my Nana'.In the afternoon my aunt Mary came from Lanchester.We went to aunt Susan's to see that she was well.When I got home I had tea at 4pm.At 6.15pm. I went to Mass and at 7pm. I came home.I watched T.V.for the rest of the night.In bed I read some books and then I went to sleep.
